name: SinainHUD Integration
description: OpenClaw plugin for sinain-hud: auto-deploys HEARTBEAT/SKILL files, tracks tool usage patterns, generates structured session summaries, and manages workspace lifecycle.

heartbeatPath.description: Local path to HEARTBEAT.md source file

skillPath.description: Local path to SKILL.md source file

sessionKey.description: Session key for the sinain agent

heartbeatPath.label: HEARTBEAT.md Path
heartbeatPath.help: Source path for auto-deploying HEARTBEAT.md to workspace

skillPath.label: SKILL.md Path
skillPath.help: Source path for auto-deploying SKILL.md to workspace

sessionKey.label: Session Key
sessionKey.help: OpenClaw session key for the sinain agent

observationFeed.enabled.label: Observation Feed
observationFeed.enabled.help: Stream structured observations to a messaging channel
